## HashMapOpts interface

Creation options for HashMap class.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HashMapOpts<K> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cap](./associative.hashmapopts.cap.md) | <code>number</code> | Initial capacity. Will be rounded up to next power of 2. |
|  [equiv](./associative.hashmapopts.equiv.md) | <code>Predicate2&lt;K&gt;</code> | Optional key equality predicate. |
|  [hash](./associative.hashmapopts.hash.md) | <code>HashFn&lt;K&gt;</code> | Function for computing key hash codes. MUST be supplied. Only numeric hashes are supported. |
|  [load](./associative.hashmapopts.load.md) | <code>number</code> | Normalized max load factor in the open (0..1) interval. The map will be resized (doubled in size) and all existing keys rehashed every time a new key is to be added and the current size exceeds this normalized load. |
